recipe.title: Carrot, Cilantro, and Chile Slaw
ingredients: 12 ounces carrots (preferably assorted colors), peeled, julienned (about 4 cups)
2 tablespoons vegetable oil or grapeseed oil
1/2 teaspoons kosher salt plus more for seasoning
instructions: Toss carrots, oil, lime juice, sugar, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and jalapeños in a large bowl. Let marinate for 15 minutes, tossing occasionally. Add cilantro and coriander; toss to evenly incorporate. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
